name: Abraxas - Demo
description:
A visual novel adventure in which you play as a young child who appears to be the only human in a world where a species of bird (called the Kimet) have become the dominant sapient life form!

While scraping for information about who you are and where you come from, you struggle fit into a world that wasn't quite made for you. With the help of your adoptive sister and the friends you make along the way, you uncover the answers you've been searching for and discover that you have a greater impact on the world and fate of the Kimet than you'd have ever imagined.
